characters.name: Is the body greater than 2 centimeters in length?
Is forewing vein Rs forked?

states: no, pointed inward or rarely absent
characters.name: Are the teeth of the mandible pointed outward (exodont)?
Is the ovipositor directed anteriorly, between the legs, and housed in a ventral groove on the metasoma?

states: yes (termed the \ul{}syntergum\ulnone{}, this is actually the fusion of tergites 1-3)
characters.name: Is apparent metasomal tergum 1 the largest?

states: no, tergum 2 is almost equal to tergum 3
characters.name: Is tergum 2 (true or apparent) several times longer than tergum 3 (true or apparent)?

states: no, the metasoma is short (not tail-like)
characters.name: Is the metasoma long and slender, almost tail-like in appearance?

states: metasomal segment 1 is at least three times longer than wide
metasoma segment 1 is at most twice as long as wide
characters.name: Is metasomal segment 1 (true or apparent) at least 3 times longer than wide?

states: no, the tarsal claw is simple
characters.name: Is there a rectangular lobe at the base of the tarsal claws?
In which biogeographic realm was the specimen collected?
Do the antenna appear to sit on an antennal shelf when viewed laterally?

states: the scape is at least 2.5 times as long as wide
the scape is at most 2.2 times as long as wide
characters.name: Is the scape at least 2.5 times longer than wide?
Are tubular veins present on the forewing?

states: yes, the stigma is elongate or thick
no, at most it is linear or spot-like
characters.name: Is the stigma of the forewing clearly indicated?

characters.unit: If a ring-like first flagellomere (\ul{}anellus\ulnone{}) is present, do not include it in the total number of flagellomeres.
characters.name: How many flagellomeres does the antenna have (not including the anellus)?
Does the forewing have a first discal cell?

states: the first discal cell has 4 or more sides
the first discal cell has 3 sides, and is almost triangular in appearance
characters.name: What is the shape of the first discal cell of the forewing?

states: no, it is nebulous or absent
characters.name: Is vein (Rs+M)a of the forewing tubular?
Is metasomal segment one (true or apparent) as long as the rest of metasoma?

states: yes, the hind tibia is swollen toward the apex, appearing club-shaped
characters.name: Does the hind tibia appear swollen and club-shaped?
Do the inner margins of the eyes strongly converge ventrally?

states: separated by more than its own diameter
separated by its own diameter or less
characters.name: How far is the lateral ocellus separated from the eye?
Is the basal flagellomere ring-like (not longer than wide)?

states: yes, the metasoma is higher than wide in lateral view
no, metasoma is slightly wider than high in lateral view
characters.name: Is the metasoma, beyond the first segment, strongly laterally compressed?
Is vein 1Rs present on the forewing?
